title: Summer at the Inn Part 2
description:
Our story tonight is taking us back to the Inn for part 2 in this series. It’s a story about a busy afternoon for the innkeeper. It’s also about watermelons, ripe and ready to cut, a dinner bell ringing on the porch, and how good it feel to care for and be cared for. So get cozy and ready to sleep.
Order the book now! hyperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens
https://linktr.ee/nothingmuchhappens
Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm
author: contact@nothingmuchhappens.com (Kathryn Nicolai)
